body.p: The Divvun project is a project under the Norwegian Sámi Parliament to make proofing tools for Sámi, which means spell checkers and automatic hyphenators for North, Lule and South Sámi. The proofing tools work on Linux (soon), MacOS X and on Windows in the most common office applications. Proofing tools for North and Lule Sámi are available, tools for South Sámi is being made in the so-called Divvun II project.
body.note: If you would like to work for us this summer, we have a summer trainee position available to test and compare spell checkers.

section.title: Without Internet?
section.p: For users with slow or no access to Internet, it is possible to order a CD from the Norwegian Sámi Parliament by calling: +47-78 48 42 22.

section.title: Anonymous cvs
section.p: The source code for this project belonging to the Norwegian Sámi Parliament and/or the University of Tromsø is open source, and is available through anonymous svn. We have also written a document on how to find your way through the source code.

section.title: Download documentation
section.p: All the documentation on this project is available on this site. If you would like to have this documentation on your own computer, follow the instruction on anonymous svn, then go on to setup forrest. After that all our documentation will be on your own computer, and you can navigate through it with a web browser.
